description: Episode of Series "Developmental psychology today". Examines behaviour and cognitive patterns characteristic of the first 18 months of life, including object permanence, stranger and separation anxiety, reaction to discrepancy and maturing co-ordinations. Discusses individual differences in infant temperament.
